reporting-org.narrative: Centre de recherches pour le développement international
Centro Internacional de Investigaciones para el Desarrollo

title.narrative: Soutien à l'élaboration du plan stratégique du CRDI pour la période allant de 2015 à 2020
Support for Development of IDRC's 2015-2020 Strategic Plan

description.narrative:
This project will support the development and distribution of IDRC's Strategic Plan for 2015-2020. Specifically, funding will serve to: -facilitate a session with IDRC senior managers on the changing global environment for IDRC's work and possible vision and goals for the 2015-2020 period and beyond -engage with Canadian partners and government, academic, and private sector stakeholders on IDRC's future directions and opportunities for alignment and collaboration -undertake research, analysis, and data visualization on issues arising in this planning process; and -edit, translate, publish, and distribute the plan.
The plan will be presented to the Board of Governors for approval in late 2014. This strategic planning exercise will involve: -situational and issues analyses that critically assess the context for IDRC's work, clarify our choices, and take the national and international contexts into account -engagement and consultations in the regions, in Canada, and within IDRC to collect input and feedback, as well as collectively reflect on implications for strategic directions and -reflections on corporate performance to highlight lessons learned from IDRC's evolving strategy.
This evidence and information will provide context for a strategic plan that inspires and establishes IDRC's aspirations for the future.
